a.n: Nadia & Fernand Léger, La Face Cachée D'un MaÎtre

p.d: Even if, from the Léger couple, only Fernand, genius of modern art, is remembered, without his wife Nadia Khodasevich Léger, his career would have had a very different destiny. Today, the work of this artist from Belarus remains unjustly ignored, as is her artistic and political role in Fernand's shadow. Directed by: Catherine Aventurier (France, 2018)
